title: SOLD; T206 M. Brown portrait - RAW

posts.post_title: SOLD; T206 M. Brown portrait - RAW
posts.post_content:
I've upgraded this one recently making it available. It was freed from it's slab when originally purchased for my raw set needs, but the flip remains with the card as a momento :)

Price shown is the delivered price. Please drop me an email if interested. Commitment to purchase outweighs any ongoing negotiations. Payment via PP preferred. Thanks all, Tony

[url]andreatny@q.com[/url]

Mordecai Brown portrait - BROWN IS SOLD
